      • fileTypeSupported

        public boolean fileTypeSupported(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Checks whether the file type should be extracted, or filtered out. To be used at the AbstractModule.extractInformation(Path path) procedure.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        boolean if to be extracted

      • fileExtensionSupported

        public boolean fileExtensionSupported(java.lang.String filePath)
        Uses the file extension filter on the string path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - string path to the file
        Returns:
        true, if the pattern matches

      • addInclusiveMimeType

        public void addInclusiveMimeType(java.lang.String mimeType)
        Inclusive: Only files of this type will be considered! If an inclusive type is added, the exclusive types won't be regarded anymore. For example: text/plain, image/gif, video/mpeg, audio/mid, application/msword
        Parameters:
        mimeType -

      • addExclusiveMimeType

        public void addExclusiveMimeType(java.lang.String mimeType)
        Exclusive: Files of this type won't be considered! If any inclusive type is specified, the exclusive types won't be regarded anymore. For example: text/plain, image/gif, video/mpeg, audio/mid, application/msword
        Parameters:
        mimeType -

        Inclusive: Only files of this type will be considered! If an inclusive type is added, the exclusive types won't be regarded anymore. For example: text, image, video, audio, application
        Parameters:
        mediaType -
